short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take back control of your YouTube experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking to improve your productivity and stay on task? Our YouTube extension is the perfect solution. Take control of your recommendations, avoid distractions, and achieve your goals.

This extension will give you a focusMode button on click of which you can hide suggested videos on youtube homepage and youtube watch screen right side suggestions.
While user will still be able to use other app exactly like before like searching videos and watching videos etc.
